title: Miscellaneous
content:
Miscellaneous

State Regulations
§ 78.39 - Unauthorized commercial activity, entertainment, and solicitation of alms prohibited
§ 78.40 - Loitering prohibited
§ 78.41 - Interference with, or unauthorized starting of, aircraft prohibited
§ 78.42 - Entry upon air operations areas restricted
§ 78.43 - Carrying of firearms restricted
§ 78.44 - Cleaning or maintenance of aircraft restricted to designated areas
§ 78.45 - Garbage or other refuse disposal restricted
§ 78.46 - Entry of animals in or upon the airport restricted
§ 78.47 - Permission to post, distribute or display printed matter required
§ 78.48 - Permission for solicitation of funds required

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
